title: Mad Max: Fury Road
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrant and his army.

title: Inception
synopsis: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a chance to have his criminal history erased.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Superbad
synopsis: Two high school friends navigate their way through a night of partying and mischief.

title: Inside Out
synopsis: After a girl moves to a new city, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new life.

title: Get Out
synopsis: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriends family estate, uncovering a series of disturbing secrets.
